QueryResult.text: SELECT V.ID, V.FILE_ID, V.CHECK_IN_COMMENT, V.IS_LATEST, V.BYTE_SIZE, F.FILE_CONTENTS, FO.IS_SEARCHABLE, FI.OWNER_ID, FI.NAME, FI.DESCRIPTION, FI.MIME_TYPE, FI.PARENT_FOLDER_ID, FI.CREATED_DATE, FI.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, FI.LANGUAGE, FO.NAME PARENT_FOLDER_NAME, FO.PATH_NAME, FO.FOLDER_TYPE, FO.ASSOC_OBJ_ID FROM CLB_DMS_VERSIONS V, CLB_DMS_FILE_STORE F, CLB_DMS_FILES FI, CLB_DMS_FOLDERS FO WHERE F.FILE_VERSION_ID = V.ID AND FI.ID = V.FILE_ID AND FI.PARENT_FOLDER_ID = FO.ID
